post.body: "focus" the ride will contain interactive dialogue, polls, surveys, & insight into the vision of Anthem. Each post will only take 5 minutes!
O.K. twitterers, "focus" is finally here! Beginning tomorrow, 12:01 am, you can go to anthemchurchblog.com and follow along on a 2 wk ride.
Tomorrow is the last worship service of 2008 at Anthem. @michaelkj is leading worship, & we will wrap up LTNP. There is a special treat 4 ??
Win Update: 5 Sundays, over 50 new people visiting Anthem-75% want to be "A Part" of Anthem-20% want to be "Involved" at Anthem! Go Big MO!
God still answers prayer. Watching God show up in people's lives is refreshing. Seeing how they respond is exciting! Who's watching you?
Derrak: This is my prayer. That God would grow in us generous and sacrificial hearts as we chase after him and recklessly love people.
New Blog post. Anthem goes weekly!!! http://anthemchurchblog.com/
New blog post. John Mayer at Anthem Church? http://anthemchurchblog.com/
Get plugged into "focus", a new online experience launching at Anthem Church on Dec. 22nd! http://anthemchurchblog.com/focus/
Had an incredible morning at Anthem Church with @stephencope and our amazing volunteers!! http://twitpic.com/qx5k , http://twitpic.com/qxkq
Are you seeing in focus? http://anthemchurchblog.com/focus/
New blog post http://anthemchurchblog.com/ - This Sunday 10am
If God wrote a letter to president-elect Obama, what do you think it would say? Part 2 "Letters to the Next President" is this Sunday 10AM
Night of Worship was awesome last night!
Anthem celebrates today with the Fretwells. Lily is the youngest member of WL, and the pride and joy of @philfretwell and Amanda! Thx U God!
1st @jerin challenged us to be thxful & the post keep coming. Today @dkeough connected us to perspective http://tinyurl.com/62m7rr Thx guys!
A key volunteer had a great Idea for Thanksgiving...Post a tweet everyday for something you are thankful for. Thx Jeff for the inspiration!
Important Meeting Tonight...Please be praying for clarity, peace, and breakthrough! Our resource is people, and people are a gift from God!
Look to God...He is the ONE!
derrak: New Anthem pics at http://tinyurl.com/5q7j73
